definitions.definition: Someone who presents a broadcast programme ; a compere or master of ceremonies .
Someone who presents a thing or person to someone else.
A small handheld device used to remotely control a computerised slide show.
A conceptual layer in GUI -based software that assumes the functionality of the " middleman ".

main_definition: ( radio , television ) Someone who presents a broadcast programme ; a compere or master of ceremonies .
secondary_definitions: Someone who presents a thing or person to someone else.
( computing ) A small handheld device used to remotely control a computerised slide show.
( software engineering ) A conceptual layer in GUI -based software that assumes the functionality of the " middleman ".
